name: Legend of Stasia Part 1
description:
Legend of Stasia Part 1 is a top-down adventure game in the style of The Legend of Zelda.  You play a girl named Stasia who embarks on a quest to rescue her dog from an evil magician.

The game is still being created and will be released in parts.  Currently only Part 1 is available.

Game, music, and artwork created by Andrew Greenwood.
